name: BitOasis
intro: Cryptocurrency platform in the MENA region
introduce: Headquartered in the UAE, BitOasis is the largest cryptocurrency platform in the MENA region. Established in 2015, BitOasis is a pioneer of the region's cryptocurrency ecosystem, serving as the go-to platform for first-time cryptocurrency buyers and professional traders alike. BitOasis aims to offer the most secure and regulated infrastructure in cryptocurrency trading for retail and institutional clients across the region.
